main_intro: DE-To work with us as a Translator, Editor or Proofreader, we need to know more about you and your skillset. Please fill in the form below and submit you application. Thank you!
submitted_info: DE-Your application was submitted. We will contact you shortly.
please_select_different_language: DE-Please select a different language for the target language
title: DE-Skillset form

word_count.title: DE-How many words can you translate daily?
word_count.helper: DE-This helps us understand your capacity when assigning you jobs.

country.helper: DE-This helps us comply with our clients' requirements and any local privacy legislations.
